title: Man Who Forced Son To Run On Treadmill, Causing His Death Gets 25 Years Jail
content: A New Jersey father has been sentenced to 25 years in prison for abusing his 6-year-old son to death.
summary: A New Jersey father has been sentenced to 25 years in prison for abusing his 6-year-old son to death.

title: Air India Cancels Israel Flights. Which Other Airlines Have Also Stopped?
content: Several international airlines unsettled by the threat of a multi-front war in the Middle East - following Iran-Israel tension, to add to the violence in Gaza, which has impacted neighbouring countries, like Lebanon - have cancelled or cut flights.
summary: Several international airlines unsettled by the threat of a multi-front war in the Middle East - following Iran-Israel tension, to add to the violence in Gaza, which has impacted neighbouring countries, like Lebanon - have cancelled or cut flights.

title: UK PM Keir Starmer Calls For Emergency Meet As Riots Intensify
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will hold an emergency meeting with police chiefs on Monday after days of violent anti-immigration protests intensified, with buildings and vehicles torched and hotels holding asylum seekers targeted.
summary: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer will hold an emergency meeting with police chiefs on Monday after days of violent anti-immigration protests intensified, with buildings and vehicles torched and hotels holding asylum seekers targeted.

title: UK's Honey Fraud Crises Explained: Beekeepers, Scientists Troubled
content: The practice of adulterating honey is well known, and historically adulterants such as ash and potato flour have been used. Now, advancements in technology and science have made it much easier, with "bespoke, designer or bioengineered" syrups.
summary: The practice of adulterating honey is well known, and historically adulterants such as ash and potato flour have been used. Now, advancements in technology and science have made it much easier, with "bespoke, designer or bioengineered" syrups.

title: "America's Most Wanted" Fugitive Found Working As A Cop In Mexico, Arrested
content: He was apprehended in Mexico, where he was working as a police officer, and handed over to deputy US Marshals in Mexico City.
summary: He was apprehended in Mexico, where he was working as a police officer, and handed over to deputy US Marshals in Mexico City.

title: China's Marriage Rate Lowest In 12 Years, Expected To Get Worse
content: The number of marriages in China is closely tied to the number of births, and the decline is likely to upset policymakers trying hard to boost the population which has been shrinking for two consecutive years.
summary: The number of marriages in China is closely tied to the number of births, and the decline is likely to upset policymakers trying hard to boost the population which has been shrinking for two consecutive years.

title: Indonesian Man Kills Neighbour Kept Asking Him Why He Was Not Married
content: The attacker, Parlindungan Siregar, was reportedly hurt and annoyed by the victim's persistent questioning about his marital status.
summary: The attacker, Parlindungan Siregar, was reportedly hurt and annoyed by the victim's persistent questioning about his marital status.

title: Kamala Harris To Name Her Veep Pick Today, Launch Swing State Tour
content: Kamala Harris will name her running mate as soon as Monday, as she prepares for a tour of US battleground states aimed at turning excitement over her presidential bid into durable support that can power her to victory.
summary: Kamala Harris will name her running mate as soon as Monday, as she prepares for a tour of US battleground states aimed at turning excitement over her presidential bid into durable support that can power her to victory.

title: Hurricane Debby To Hit Florida, May Cause Historic Rainfall, Flooding
content: By 11 p.m. EDT (0300 GMT) on Sunday, the hurricane had sustained winds of 75 mph (120 kph), growing from a slow moving tropical storm that gained strength from warm Gulf waters. It will likely just get stronger.
summary: By 11 p.m. EDT (0300 GMT) on Sunday, the hurricane had sustained winds of 75 mph (120 kph), growing from a slow moving tropical storm that gained strength from warm Gulf waters. It will likely just get stronger.

title: AI Deepfakes Fuel Voter Manipulation, Partisan Tension in US Elections
content: A "deepfake" video parodying Kamala Harris, a manipulated expletive-laden clip of Joe Biden -- a tide of AI-fuelled political disinformation has prompted alarm over its potential to manipulate voters as the US presidential race heats up.
summary: A "deepfake" video parodying Kamala Harris, a manipulated expletive-laden clip of Joe Biden -- a tide of AI-fuelled political disinformation has prompted alarm over its potential to manipulate voters as the US presidential race heats up.

title: Kim Jong Un Deploys 250 Ballistic Missiles On North Korea's South Border
content: The olive green mobile launchers were displayed during a special "transferring" ceremony in the capital Pyongyang on Sunday, the official Korean Central News Agency reported. The missile launchers were an "up-to-date tactical attack weapon" said Kim.
summary: The olive green mobile launchers were displayed during a special "transferring" ceremony in the capital Pyongyang on Sunday, the official Korean Central News Agency reported. The missile launchers were an "up-to-date tactical attack weapon" said Kim.

title: Viral Turkish Shooter Joins X, Posts A "Robots" Question For Elon Musk
content: Yusuf Dikec, the Turkish shooter who has captured global attention following his silver medal win at the 2024 Paris Olympics, has joined the Elon Musk-owned social media platform X, previously known as Twitter.
summary: Yusuf Dikec, the Turkish shooter who has captured global attention following his silver medal win at the 2024 Paris Olympics, has joined the Elon Musk-owned social media platform X, previously known as Twitter.

title: Nancy Pelosi Says Joe Biden's Face Should Be Added To Mount Rushmore
content: "You have Teddy Roosevelt up there. And he's wonderful. I don't say take him down. But you can add Biden," the 84-year-old said.
summary: "You have Teddy Roosevelt up there. And he's wonderful. I don't say take him down. But you can add Biden," the 84-year-old said.

title: 300 Killed, Sheikh Hasina Under Fire: Violent Bangladesh Protests Explained
content: In the two separate terms and 20 years that she has been the Prime Minister of Bangladesh, the ongoing protests that have seen over 300 people killed, is perhaps Sheikh Hasina's biggest test.
summary: In the two separate terms and 20 years that she has been the Prime Minister of Bangladesh, the ongoing protests that have seen over 300 people killed, is perhaps Sheikh Hasina's biggest test.

title: US Flight Makes Emergency Landing After Lice Spotted In Woman's Hair
content: Upon landing, passengers were informed of a 12-hour delay and were given hotel vouchers.
summary: Upon landing, passengers were informed of a 12-hour delay and were given hotel vouchers.

title: Robert Kennedy Jr Once Dropped A Dead Bear In New York's Central Park
content: Independent US presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr said in a video posted online on Sunday that he dumped a dead bear in New York City's Central Park a decade ago and staged it to look like a bike had hit it.
summary: Independent US presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr said in a video posted online on Sunday that he dumped a dead bear in New York City's Central Park a decade ago and staged it to look like a bike had hit it.

title: Australia Raises Terror Threat Level From "Possible" To "Probable"
content: Australia on Monday raised its terror threat level to "probable" from "possible", citing an increase in extremist views in the country leading to a more than 50% chance of the planning of an onshore attack in the next 12 months.
summary: Australia on Monday raised its terror threat level to "probable" from "possible", citing an increase in extremist views in the country leading to a more than 50% chance of the planning of an onshore attack in the next 12 months.

title: Dostoevsky To Proust, Pope Francis Lists His Favourite Authors
content: Pope Francis's bookish side emerged Sunday, after the Vatican published a letter in which the pontiff encouraged young priests to read --- while revealing that he himself likes the great tragedies.
summary: Pope Francis's bookish side emerged Sunday, after the Vatican published a letter in which the pontiff encouraged young priests to read --- while revealing that he himself likes the great tragedies.

title: Violent Protests In Bangladesh Day After 98 Killed In Clashes: 10 Points
content: The overall death count from fierce clashes in Bangladesh has risen to over 300, after 98 people died yesterday in the deadliest day in weeks of anti-government demonstrations. The violence-hit country is set for more protests today,

title: Iran Could Attack Israel Today, Netanyahu Eyes Preemptive Strike: Report
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken has warned his counterparts from the G7 countries that an attack by Iran and Hezbollah against Israel could commence as early as Monday, Axios reported.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken has warned his counterparts from the G7 countries that an attack by Iran and Hezbollah against Israel could commence as early as Monday, Axios reported.
